citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15pm on
08-AUG-18.
No answer was received at any door of the houses on the premises nor the phone number listed within 30 minutes
from the time of initial contact.
